subject: How to record test results in XML format
msgSnippet: Hi All, We have an Autotest suit using Junit in my project. We were generating .txt files to record all the test results. I want to use XML for recording all
messageBody:
Hi All,

We have an Autotest suit using Junit in my project. We were
generating .txt files to record all the test results. I want to use
XML for recording all the autotest results. Please advice me on how
to go about this.
